Module technology.sola.engine
Package technology.sola.engine.defaults

Class SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator

java.lang.Object
technology.sola.engine.defaults.SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator
Enclosing class:
SolaWithDefaults
public class SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator extends Object
DefaultsConfigurator provides methods for enabling various default functionality.

  • Method Details

    • useDebug

      public SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator useDebug()
      Enables debug rendering. This includes collider outlines and broad phase debug information.
      Returns:
      this

    • useBackgroundColor

      public SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator useBackgroundColor(Color backgroundColor)
      Updates the background color (what everything clears to each frame). Default is Color.BLACK.
      Parameters:
      backgroundColor - the new color the renderer clears to
      Returns:
      this

    • usePhysics

      public SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator usePhysics()
      Initializes the SolaWithDefaults.solaPhysics instance. This adds several EcsSystems to the Sola.solaEcs instance.

      EcsSystems added

      • GravitySystem
      • PhysicsSystem
      • CollisionDetectionSystem
      • ImpulseCollisionResolutionSystem
      • ParticleSystem
      Returns:
      this

    • useGraphics

      public SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator useGraphics()
      Initializes the SolaWithDefaults.solaGraphics instance. This adds several SolaEntityGraphicsModules to it and adds several EcsSystems to the Sola.solaEcs instance.

      Modules added

      • CircleEntityGraphicsModule
      • RectangleEntityGraphicsModule
      • SpriteEntityGraphicsModule

      EcsSystems added

      • SpriteAnimatorSystem
      • TransformAnimatorSystem
      Returns:
      this

    • useLighting

      public SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator useLighting()
      Adds the ScreenSpaceLightMapGraphicsModule SolaGraphicsModule with ambient color set to black.
      Returns:
      this

    • useLighting

      public SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator useLighting(Color ambientColor)
      Adds the ScreenSpaceLightMapGraphicsModule SolaGraphicsModule with ambient color set.
      Parameters:
      ambientColor - the ambient color to use
      Returns:
      this

    • useGui

      public SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator useGui()
      Initializes the GuiDocument instance with a light GuiTheme.
      Returns:
      this

    • useGui

      public SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator useGui(GuiTheme guiTheme)
      Initializes the GuiDocument instance with a desired GuiTheme.
      Parameters:
      guiTheme - the theme to use
      Returns:
      this

    • useGui

      public SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator useGui(GuiTheme guiTheme, List<GuiElementJsonBlueprint<?,?,?>> additionalGuiElementJsonBlueprints)
      Initializes the GuiDocument instance with a desired GuiTheme. Also registers additional GuiElementJsonBlueprints for parsing different kinds of elements as JSON.
      Parameters:
      guiTheme - the theme to use
      additionalGuiElementJsonBlueprints - addition gui element json blueprints to register for parsing
      Returns:
      this
